ABOUT 
 
AstroGuide provides up-to-date astronomy information from a variety of online sources 
Data and images are sourced from the JPL Small-Body Database, the NASA Exoplanet Archive, and Wikipedia. 
News is sourced from websites including space.com, astronomy.com, sciencedaily.com, and others. 
Astronomy Picture of the Day is run by NASA. 
 
NOTE: AstroGuide currently REQUIRES internet connection to function. Offline support will be added in 
a future update, but until then, make sure your phone has internet or you will see only a blank screen! 
 
 
If you appreciate AstroGuide, please consider sharing the app with others and/or leaving a rating 
Made by Joheen Chakraborty, 2017 
 
If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact astroguide.about@gmail.com
